ygData.subject: Re: War
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t think Mainframe s gonna lift a finger to do anything, even if they could. If they did they d have to bust the other ... oh, 300 or so BW RPGs, all

I don't think Mainframe's gonna lift a finger to do anything, even if 
they could. If they did they'd have to bust the other ... oh, 300 or 
so BW RPGs, all using BW names.

Yup, KSL, I said sorry 'cause the arm's your char.

And Kluster is still a Maximal, he ain't in the Alliance base. 
DevilDuer is standing in the CR room, though, right next to the 
chambers.

::Zardus/WarMachine::

Zardus turns around as he hears a bot's voice, seeing Najah. He lands 
near the bot.

"I am Zardus, Alliance commander," he introduces himself, "You're 
looking to join?"

He figured that since the bot wasn't firing, he was either neutral or 
on the Alliance.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The missiles dig into WarMachine's chest, leaving smoking dents. The 
gestalt stumbles forward, but regainst balance.

Making his way back toward Minion, he fires at Surge and Shokaract, 
missiles and lasser shots streaming out at them.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: Hey, Shokaract just fired, Zardus is the one who made the arm 
blow off.
> And I'm sorry, I got you mixed up with JP. I almost got kicked out 
for
> making such a big gestalt, he was 30 feet tall and JP actually 
kicked me
> out. Well, he didn't remove me from egroups, and I just corrected 
the
> mistake and backed up everything I did. And I can't RP a gestalt 
correctly?
> I have been doing it for some time, now...
